title: Rob- The Man of Steal  (An unfair thief "Champion")
body:
HP 475+83 4.37/5 sec +1.36
Stamina: 175 +20 Moving costs 3 stamina per second.
When not moving for 2 seconds, heals 20/25/30/35 per sec. Upon reaching 0 Rob must rest for 3 seconds while it goes back to full.
Taking 50% Bonus damage while resting. Also moves 15% slower once below 15/18/21/24 stamina.
AD 48+3.7 
Atk Speed 0.817 +0.016
Armor 22.3 +2.1
MR 26 +3.4
Speed 340/350/360/370



Passive: Lust for Gold/ Pay Day/ Bribe the System.
MONEY IS EVERYTHING:
Killing anything grants 2 Bonus Gold
However, being killed gives 10% bonus GOld.

Pay Day:  Every 5 minutes, The closes enemy will be marked with Money Pot for 1 minute. Rob deals 15/20/25/30% Bonus damage to them.
Killing them grants Lvlx15 Bonus Gold.
HOWEVER, being killed by them without the assist of any other champion instantly grants their team (Level of the killer x 20 Gold each). bonus.

Bribe the System:  Upon death, Rob can pay Death time x 7G to revive instantly. This slowly increases, at 20/30/40MIN, it is changed to 9/11/13 per second.



Q: Gun point. 22/29/36/43/50 Stamina 13/11.75/10.5/9.25/8 sec
Passive: Luck. Attacking enemies grant stacks of Luck. 5 per hit.
Reaching 100 Stacks the next enemy killed by Gun Point grants 2/4/6/8/10 bonus Gold.

Active: Points a very powerful gun at a direction while shouting random stuff.
Fires after 1.25 seconds. Range 550. Dealing damage based on how far the first enemy is. Dealing up to (Closest to Furtherst)
140-25/200-50/260-75/320-100/380-125 +135-40%AD Physical Damage. 


W: Pick Pocket  15/20/25/30/35 Stamina 19/18/17/16/15 seconds.
TO an enemy within 125/150/175/200/225 range.
Deals 30/50/80/120/170+90/95/100/105/110%AD Damage. Also steals up to 10/15/20/25/30 gold from them IF THE TARGET is a champion.
within 2 seconds if the enemy chooses to attack ROB, they will gain 10% Speed, Attack speed and Damage boost for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.


E: Threaten  30/40/50/60/70 Stamina. 26/25.5/24.5/23/21 sec.
Range 175
Has different effects to enemies with more than 50% hp or less than 50% hp.
More than 50%: The enemy is taunted with 20/25/30/35/40 reduced AD for 1 sec. They also lose 10/15/20/25/30 Armor and MR.
Less than 50%: The enemy is feared with 10/15/20/25/30 bonus speed, loses 20/30/40/50/60 Armor and MR, takes 30/50/70/90/110 +40/50/60/70/80%AD 
Physical Damage. Lasts 1 second.
While threatened, gold stealing is 100% more effective.


R:Stealing Spree 50/70/90 Stamina. 125/105/85 sec.
Passive: Increases gold per 10 sec by 2/3/4
Active: For 10 seconds, Basic attacks grant 1/2/3% of the damage dealt as Gold to Rob. Max of 100/200/300 Gold.
Basic attacks also gain 25 range. And deals 3/5/7% +1% per 75AD of the opponents Max HP as bonus Magicaldamage but this does not account 
into the gold earned and does not apply gold either. Killing champions grant whole team 25/40/55G each.
 Being killed grants the oponent team 30/40/50 G each.
